text: The Reluctant Fundamentalist is a 2012 movie based on Mohsin Hamid's 2007 book of the same name. It is about a person who comes to the United States with some ideas, but these ideas change after the World Trade Center terrorist attack on September 11, 2001. ==References== Category:2012 movies Category:Movies based on books Category:2010s Indian movies Category:Pakistani movies Category:American movies Category:Qatari movies Category:British movies Category:Movies directed by Mira Nair
title: The Reluctant Fundamentalist (movie)
